thread.title: 5 Things You Didn't Know About Peter Pan
thread.title_full: 5 Things You Didn't Know About Peter Pan

author: Teresa Strasser
title: 5 Things You Didn't Know About Peter Pan
text:
5 Things You Didn't Know About Peter Pan Fun Facts on Neverland's Timeless Characters 5:30 PM, Oct 8, 2015 Previous Next The new movie “Pan” isn’t the first time we’ve seen Peter Pan up on the big screen. The List's Teresa Strasser with 5 things you didn't know about Neverland's time-less characters... now on The List! LSTV Previous Next 
The new movie “Pan” isn’t the first time we’ve seen Peter Pan up on the big screen. The List 's Teresa Strasser with 5 things you didn't know about Neverland's timeless characters... now on The List ! 
1. There have been more than 15 movies based on Neverland’s timeless characters. 
2. Reese Witherspoon’s going to be playing Tinkerbell in a new Disney spinoff. It’s like action and Reese is producing, too… so count on some legally blonde fairy dust. 
3. “Hook” was Gwyneth Paltrow’s 2 nd movie. She was only 19 when she played young Wendy. 
4. For “Hook,” Tom Hanks was considered for the role of Peter Pan, but it eventually went to Robin Williams. David Bowie actually turned down the role of Captain Hook. 
5. You know the Lost Boys battle cry? Turns out “Bangarang” is Jamaican slang defined as a hubburb, uproar, disorder. 

That’s 5 things you didn’t know about Peter Pan. Copyright 2015 Scripps Media, Inc. All rights reserved. This material may not be published, broadcast, rewritten, or redistributed.
